div.pre: 1804 Susa, Susiana, 1933-1934 (1023) Burial: after 140 B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 97 AR. Pot hoard, from excava- tions Alexander III: 5 lifetime and early post. dr. (Lampsacus 3, Colophon 1, Baby- lon 1) 6 late post. tetradr. (Cyme 1, Temnus 1, Miletus 1, Alabanda 1, Perge 1 with anchor ctmk., unc. Asia Minor 1) Eastern imit. Alexander III: 11 tetradr. Philip III: 1 dr. (Colophon) Lysimachus: 4 post. tetradr. (Byzantium 1, Lysimacheia 1, Cius 1, Cyzicus 1) Antiochus II: 1 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim) Seleucus III: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Antiochus III: 3 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim 1, Antiocheia 2) Seleucus IV: 4 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 2, Antiocheia 2) Antiochus IV: 8 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 1, Susa 4, Antiocheia 1, Ace 1, Soli 1) 1 dr. (Ecbatana) Antiochus V: 4 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Demetrius I: 10 tetradr. (Susa 4, An- tiocheia 5, unc. western mint 1) 1 dr. (Ecbatana) Alexander I Bala: 21 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim 8, Susa 7, Antiocheia- Charax Spasinou 2, Ecbatana I, 3) 1 dr. (Antiocheia) Demetrius II: 4 tetradr. (Susa 1 , An- tiocheia-Charax Spasinou 2, Antio- cheia? 1) 1 dr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim ) Aradus: 1 dr. Kamniskires I, Elymaïs: 1 tetradr. (Susa ) Harithat, king of Hagar: 2 tetradr. Abal, king of Hagar: 2 tetradr. Mithradates I, Parthia: 3 dr. (unc. mint) Euthydemus I, Bactria: 1 tetradr.
